title: Welcome To My Blog

Since this post doesnâ€™t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Latest Updates
text:
The Alkek Center for Metagenomics and Microbiome Research (CMMR) is a leading hub for microbiome research at Baylor College of Medicine.
Our team is dedicated to creating high-performance tools that empower researchers in the field of bioinformatics. This blog serves as a platform to share our latest updates, tutorials, and R package announcements (syndicated to R-bloggers and RWeekly) with the global data science community.
